Errr Jhonny, Trinity is inside the base,  and until I know Terrorbot is Out=
side the Base

  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2001 5:27 PM

: Re: Recon vs. Angel Prime


  Terrorbot became enraged, he was tired of p=
laying games, he was about to 
  torch Trinity and Rachel, when he suddenly=
 felt a pain in his side. When he 
  looked there was a large gash with his=
 circuits exposed. "Looking for me 
  Terrorbot?" A familiar voice called o=
ut. Terrorbot looked and then saw who 
  had assualted him. "So, you return=
 at last Recon," Terrorbot said. Recon had 
  definitely reappeared, he was=
 holding a large, jagged, and unstable energon 
  crystal and it was obviou=
s he was being over charged by it, but he wasn't 
  going to revert back to=
 beast mode, yet. "Rachel, get Trinity out of here, 
  keep her safe," Reco=
n ordered.
